content: this is a summary of a civil case that took place in the klaipeda district court the court made a final decision regarding the division of matrimonial property which includes a land plot a dwelling house and two cars the court ruled in favor of the applicant and ordered the defendant to pay compensation for the increase in the value of the applicants property the case also involves a divorce with the applicant seeking to dissolve the marriage divide assets and establish a minimum contact arrangement for the children the defendant disputes some of the claims and has filed a counterclaim the court discontinued a pretrial investigation involving the defendant the defendant also claims that the applicant owes them money for a loan which has been confirmed by a third party the court hearing includes witness testimony regarding the renovation of an apartment the court determined the community property of the spouses based on evidence and arguments presented by both parties the court awarded the land plot dwelling house and one car to the applicant and the other car to the defendant the court dismissed other claims and counterclaims made by the parties
